attributes.action: be consistent in allowing or rejecting e petitions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have read a number of petitions that have been rejected for a single spelling mistake.

And then i have read a current petition, on vets not charging for prescriptions that is so full of spelling mistakes it is unbelieveable.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
